Method Detail

removeContext

public static String removeContext(CharSequence url,
                                   CharSequence context)
Remove the context string and all content before it. If the context is empty, remove all content before the first / after the protocol separator (://)

Parameters:
url -
context -
Returns:
the url with the context removed

addContextPath

public static String addContextPath(String ctx,
                                    String url)
Adds the context do the url. Only is added if the url begins with /

Parameters:
ctx - the corrent context
url - the url
Returns:
the url with the correct context
